plot: Artifacts take Monroe and Nick closer to the heart of a mystery; a deadly move could send Portland into chaos.

After studying the new keys, Monroe concludes the map, although still incomplete, points to a church in a village of the Back Forest in Germany and sets out with Nick to search for the crusades age hiding place. They are opposed by the local curate's feral guardians militia. Back home, Wu and Hank work out the Black Claw recruited hit-man Marwan Hanano for something, last minute it concerns Andrew Dixon's mayoral campaign, too late to prevent a sniper attack on the rally.—KGF Vissers
